author: anilpatel1234
title: Small room, good price
text:
When we arrived we were told that the three rooms that we had booked were in fact not booked. A friend had booked using booking.com and the problem was attributed entirely to this. Eventually it was resolved but it was an unwelcome first impression after a red eye flight to JFK.
Otherwise everything seemed good. The room was very small but had everything I needed - including shower, tv, sockets, wifi. I don't think the rooms are set up for sharing, but if that is the way you want to go you'd better be pretty intimate - you'll be in each other's space the whole time and you have a view of the toilet and shower areas from the bedroom.
The location is pretty good as well - lots of restaurants, coffee shops, subway, etc and you're right in the middle of the city. I'd recommend.
